snippet: The offense of Carmelo Anthony and J. R. Smith has powered the third-longest victory run in the history of the team, whose defense has continued to be average in terms of points allowed.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column holds that stellar offensive play by New York Knicks stars Carmelo Anthony and J R Smith has fueled third-longest victory run in team's history.
lead_paragraph: The offense of Carmelo Anthony and J. R. Smith has powered the third-longest victory run in the history of the team, whose defense has continued to be average in terms of points allowed.

headline.seo: Knicks Riding Carmelo Anthony and J.R. Smith in 12-Game Streak
headline.main: Knicks’ Run Fueled by the Shooting of Two Hot Hands
headline.print_headline: Knicks’ Run Fueled by the Shooting of Two Hot Hands
